description: A number of cats die in a "spate of poisonings" in the same street in Norwich, prompting the RSPCA to appeal for information.
title: 'Spate of poisonings' kills 'up to 10' cats in same Norwich street
title_page: 'Spate of poisonings' kills 'up to 10' cats in same Norwich street - BBC News
maintext:
A number of cats have died in a "spate of poisonings" in the same street in Norwich, prompting the RSPCA to appeal for information.
"Up to ten" pets have all died or been found ill in Goulburn Road since 13 January, the charity said.
They had all suffered symptoms "consistent with poisoning".
"It is extremely concerning that so many animals died in this horrible way in such a short space of time," said inspector Ben Kirby.
